actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Bishop (NY) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).

description: At the end of the bill, add the following new title:    TITLE V--RECREATIONAL FISHING FOR ATLANTIC STRIPED BASS IN THE BLOCK ISLAND SOUND TRANSIT ZONE    SEC. 501. RECREATIONAL FISHING FOR ATLANTIC STRIPED BASS IN THE BLOCK ISLAND SOUND TRANSIT ZONE.    (a) In General- Except as provided in subsection (a), the Secretary shall not prohibit fishing for Atlantic Striped Bass in the Block Island Sound transit zone.***.
purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-444 to allow for recreational fishing of Atlantic Striped Bass in the Block Island Sound transit zone.
